summary: Completed comprehensive testing of iteration 6 bug fixes and features. All backend tests passed (16/16 - 100%). All frontend features verified working correctly. CRITICAL BUG FIX VERIFIED: Property dropdown in 'Create Guest Link' dialog now shows both properties (Casa Brezza, Casa Bella) using Shadcn Select component instead of native select.

issues: Console warning: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent - accessibility improvement recommended

passed_tests: BUG FIX #1: Property dropdown in 'Create Guest Link' dialog shows both Casa Brezza and Casa Bella (Shadcn Select)
BUG FIX: Status change dropdowns use Shadcn Select on ALL booking types (22 dropdowns found)
PropertyEditor opens when clicking Settings icon on property
PropertyEditor shows extra_services tab (Servizi) with add/remove functionality
Admin properties endpoint returns Casa Brezza and Casa Bella
Guest link creation end-to-end flow works
All admin tabs render without errors: Richieste, Link Ospiti, Strutture, Spiagge, Ristoranti, Esperienze, Noleggi, Mappe & Info
Status update API works for all collections: rental, beach, restaurant, experience, nightlife, extra, ticket
All requests endpoint returns all 8 booking collections
critical_code_review_comments: Shadcn Select component correctly replaces native HTML select in Dialog for Safari/Radix UI compatibility
Status change uses confirmAndNotify function that updates status AND prompts WhatsApp notification
PropertyEditor has 8 tabs: Base, WiFi, Check-in/out, Contatti, Regole, FAQ, Guasti, Servizi
extra_services field properly supported in Property model and PropertyEditor component
seed_data_creation: Test guest booking created and deleted during backend testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All bug fixes verified working: 1) Property dropdown in 'Create Guest Link' dialog uses Shadcn Select and shows both properties (Casa Brezza, Casa Bella), 2) Status change dropdowns use Shadcn Select on all booking types with confirmAndNotify function, 3) PropertyEditor has extra_services tab (Servizi). Properties: casa-brezza, casa-bella. Total 23 requests in Richieste tab (6 tickets, 6 rentals, 1 beach, 4 restaurants, 2 experiences, 2 nightlife, 1 extra service).

property_dropdown_bug_fix.details: Create Guest Link dialog property dropdown shows 'Seleziona struttura', 'Casa Brezza (casa-brezza)', 'Casa Bella (casa-bella)' using Shadcn Select component

status_change_dropdowns.details: All booking type tables use Shadcn Select for status changes. Found 22 status dropdowns across all booking types. Options: In attesa, Confermato, Annullato for bookings; Aperto, Risolto for tickets

property_editor.details: PropertyEditor opens via Settings icon. 8 tabs available: Base, WiFi, Check-in/out, Contatti, Regole, FAQ, Guasti, Servizi

extra_services_tab.details: Servizi tab in PropertyEditor allows adding/removing extra services with name, price, description, and enabled toggle

admin_tabs.details: All 8 admin tabs render correctly: Richieste (23 requests), Link Ospiti, Strutture (2), Spiagge, Ristoranti, Esperienze, Noleggi, Mappe & Info

property_dropdown_in_dialog.before: Native HTML <select> inside Radix Dialog portal not rendering options properly on Safari
property_dropdown_in_dialog.after: Shadcn Select component renders correctly in Dialog portal
property_dropdown_in_dialog.evidence: Screenshot shows dropdown with Casa Brezza and Casa Bella options visible

status_change_dropdowns.before: Native select elements for status changes
status_change_dropdowns.after: All status changes use Shadcn Select with confirmAndNotify function
status_change_dropdowns.evidence: Found 22 button[role='combobox'] elements in Richieste tab
